caption: Categories
name: category
description: Initial working list of categories (work in progress).

findings.caption: Findings
findings.description: Findings events report findings, detections, and possible resolutions of malware, anomalies, or other actions performed by security products.

audit.caption: Audit Activity
audit.description: Audit events are any security-relevant activity in the system. A security-relevant activity can be a change to the security state of the system, an attempted or actual system access. Audit events can include, for example, password changes, user changes, failed logons, or failed accesses related to information systems, administrative privilege usage, or third-party credential usage.
